Title: Establishes that domestic violence advocates may not disclose any communication made by a client to the advocate except in certain circumstances
Summary: Establishes that domestic violence advocates may not disclose any communication made by a client to the advocate except in certain circumstances including after the consent of the client or if the client reveals an intent to commit a crime.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil practice law and rules, in relation to establishing that domestic violence advocates may not disclose any communication made by a client to the advocate except in certain circumstances
